title: Drawing, "Botanical sketches, Jamaica, West Indies", July 1865
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom ?: dark green; at top left underneath large petal: orange blotched with lake red; followed at bottom left with the place and date.
description: Vertical view showing details of a plant:  two details of the stem and leaves at bottom; a high stem grows out of a bunch of leaves and carries petals on top; and a petal in large scale at top left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical sketches, Jamaica, West Indies", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-18.
